message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

This paper deals with sentiment classification using word embeddings, which is a common task in natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Within cs.CL, the paper focuses on learning domain-sensitive and sentiment-aware embeddings, which involves machine learning techniques such as deep learning and neural networks. This suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.DL (Deep Learning) are also likely categories. Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval (IR) techniques such as data augmentation, which suggests cs.IR as another possible category. Finally, the paper deals with semantic representations of words, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (AI) research, suggesting cs.AI as a possible category.
